The legend of St. Cuthbert with the antiquities of the Church of Durham / by B.R., Esq. Hegge, Robert, 1599-1629. R. B. (Richard Baddeley)
[8], 93 p. : port.
Printed for Christopher Eccleston ..., London : 1663.
Written by Robert Hegge. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.). Editor's prologue signed: B.R. [i.e., Richard Baddeley] Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
